titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on a certain ion exchange resin.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 9/12/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the suspension, through December 31, 2009, of the duty on a certain ion exchange resin (031'-oxybisphenoxarsine).
